attributes.action: Say "No" to Rolf Harris being moved to HMP Leyhill  an Open Prison. Keep him in High Security Prisons
attributes.additional_details: News has been broadcast that Rolf Harris is/could be moved to HMP Leyhill in Gloucestershire within weeks. I/We believe that paedophiles should remain within a high security prison, as allowing them the "luxury" of completing a sentence as vile as sexual abuse of children is a slap in the face to the victims of such a hideous crime... and warrants nothing less than a high security prison..Harris should complete his sentence in a High Security prison..
